theArcher:AlwaysAhead.NAME: Always Ahead
theArcher:AlwaysAhead.DESCRIPTION: When you play a *Fatigue card, NL Deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theArcher:ArrowStorm.NAME: Arrow Storm
theArcher:ArrowStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Shot".

theArcher:BountyHunt.NAME: Bounty Hunt
theArcher:BountyHunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !D! Gold NL *Fatigue !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yDamage and #yGold by #yFatigue.

theArcher:ActionSurge.NAME: Action Surge
theArcher:ActionSurge.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw !M!. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.
theArcher:ActionSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M!. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

theArcher:ArrowToTheKnee.NAME: Arrow to the Knee
theArcher:ArrowToTheKnee.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

theArcher:BolaShot.NAME: Bola Shot
theArcher:BolaShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, apply *Slow to the target.

theArcher:BoomerangShot.NAME: Boomerang Shot
theArcher:BoomerangShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. At the end of each of your turns deal !M! damage.

theArcher:BowBreak.NAME: Bow Break
theArcher:BowBreak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a *Clumsy into your draw pile.

theArcher:BraceForImpact.NAME: Brace For Impact
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yBlock by #yPrepared.

theArcher:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
theArcher:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 Blur. NL *Fatigue !M!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yBlock by #yFatigue.

theArcher:EffortlessShot.NAME: Effortless Shot
theArcher:EffortlessShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable, Weak and *Targeted. NL Exhaust

theArcher:EmptyQuiver.NAME: Empty Quiver
theArcher:EmptyQuiver.DESCRIPTION: Shot cards you draw cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Shot card, Exhaust it.

theArcher:Evasion.NAME: Evasion
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yBlock by #yFatigue.

theArcher:EvasiveManoeuvres.NAME: Evasive Manoeuvres
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yBuffer by #yPrepared .

theArcher:FlamingShot.NAME: Flaming Shot
theArcher:FlamingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to 1 card. NL *Fatigue !M!
theArcher:FlamingShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to 3 cards. NL *Fatigue !M!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases damage by #yFatigue.

theArcher:FocusedStrike.NAME: Focused Strike
theArcher:FocusedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 2 cards. NL *Fatigue !M!
theArcher:FocusedStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 3 cards. NL *Fatigue !M!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases damage by #yFatigue.

theArcher:GoingProne.NAME: Going Prone
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yBlock by #yFatigue.

theArcher:HailOfArrows.NAME: Hail of Arrows
theArcher:HailOfArrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of Shot cards played this combat to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deals !D! damage.)

theArcher:StopDropRoll.NAME: Stop Drop Roll
theArcher:StopDropRoll.DESCRIPTION: Halve incoming damage. NL End your turn.

theArcher:HastilyMadePlans.NAME: Hastily-Made Plans
theArcher:HastilyMadePlans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Shuffle up to !M! card into your draw pile.
theArcher:HastilyMadePlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Shuffle up to !M! cards into your draw pile.

theArcher:HawkEye.NAME: Hawk Eye
theArcher:HawkEye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! *Targeted if damage was received. NL Exhaust.

theArcher:HobblingBlow.NAME: Hobbling Blow
theArcher:HobblingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses X Strength. NL Apply X Vulnerable.
theArcher:HobblingBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enemy loses X+1 Strength. NL Apply X+1 Vulnerable.

theArcher:HuntingShot.NAME: Hunting Shot
theArcher:HuntingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. Exhaust.

theArcher:ImprovedBowString.NAME: Improved String
theArcher:ImprovedBowString.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
theArcher:ImprovedBowString.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards.

theArcher:LeechingShot.NAME: Leeching Shot
theArcher:LeechingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

theArcher:LiquidCourage.NAME: Liquid Courage
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yArtifact gained by #yFatigue.

theArcher:MarkedForDeath.NAME: Marked For Death
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yTargeted applied by #yFatigue.

theArcher:MasteryForm.NAME: Mastery Form
theArcher:MasteryForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL *Fatigue cards no longer decrement. *Prepare cards increase on use.
theArcher:MasteryForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Fatigue cards no longer decrement. *Prepare cards increase on use.

theArcher:NockedAndLoaded.NAME: Nocked and Loaded
theArcher:NockedAndLoaded.DESCRIPTION: The first Shot card you play each turn costs 0.
theArcher:NockedAndLoaded.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first Shot card you play each turn costs 0.

theArcher:Overdraw.NAME: Over Draw
theArcher:Overdraw.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your attacks deal double damage. Draw one less card next turn.

theArcher:Parry.NAME: Parry
theArcher:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this cards Block by !M! for this combat. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

theArcher:PatientShot.NAME: Patient Shot
theArcher:PatientShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your discard pile.
theArcher:PatientShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your discard pile. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

theArcher:Persevere.NAME: Persevere
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yBlock by #yPrepared.

theArcher:PointBlankShot.NAME: Point Blank Shot
theArcher:PointBlankShot.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL *Fatigue !M!.
theArcher:PointBlankShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 3 Vulnerable. NL *Fatigue !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases damage by #yFatigue.

theArcher:PoisonedTips.NAME: Poisoned Tips
theArcher:PoisonedTips.DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! Poison.

theArcher:PreparedShot.NAME: Prepared Shot
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yDamage by #yPrepared.

theArcher:PreparedStrategy.NAME: Prepared Strategy
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yBuffer by #yPrepared .

theArcher:PrimedShot.NAME: Primed Shot
theArcher:PrimedShot.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable, Weak and *Targeted. NL Exhaust

theArcher:QuickDodge.NAME: Quick Dodge
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yBlock by #yFatigue.

theArcher:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
theArcher:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 Shot cards from your draw pile.
theArcher:QuickDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 Shot cards from your draw pile. They cost 0 this turn.

theArcher:QuickRelease.NAME: Quick Release
theArcher:QuickRelease.DESCRIPTION: When you play a shot card, draw a shot card.
theArcher:QuickRelease.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play a shot card, draw a shot card.

theArcher:RapidShot.NAME: Rapid Shot
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases damage by #yFatigue.

theArcher:ReadyAndWaiting.NAME: Ready And Waiting
theArcher:ReadyAndWaiting.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is *Prepared, NL gain !M! Block.

theArcher:RecklessShot.NAME: Reckless Shot
theArcher:RecklessShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Target gains 3 temporary Strength. NL *Fatigue !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases damage by #yFatigue.

theArcher:Reserves.NAME: Reserves
theArcher:Reserves.DESCRIPTION: Play the bottom card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

theArcher:Respite.NAME: Respite
theArcher:Respite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !theArcher:SecondMagic! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

theArcher:RicochetShot.NAME: Ricochet Shots
theArcher:RicochetShot.DESCRIPTION: Cards that target single enemies now target ALL *Targeted enemies.
theArcher:RicochetShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cards that target single enemies now target ALL *Targeted enemies. NL Apply 1 target to all enemies.

theArcher:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
theArcher:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !theArcher:theArcherPreparedSecondMagic! Weak. NL *Prepare !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yBlock by #yPrepared .

theArcher:SpeedShot.NAME: Speed Shot
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases damage by #yFatigue.

theArcher:StudiedShot.NAME: Studied Shot
theArcher:StudiedShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When played permanently increase damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theArcher:TakeCover.NAME: Take Cover
theArcher:TakeCover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! plated armor.

theArcher:Threaten.NAME: Threaten
theArcher:Threaten.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. Gain !M! Strength NL Exhaust.

theArcher:TrickShot.NAME: Trick Shot
theArcher:TrickShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL *Prepare !M!. NL If not played on your turn, return this to the top of your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn if not played this card increases #yDamage by #yPrepared .

theArcher:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
theArcher:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !theArcher:theArcherFatigueSecondMagic! damage back. NL *Fatigue !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases block by #yFatigue.

theArcher:TuckAndRoll.NAME: Tuck and Roll
theArcher:TuckAndRoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL *Fatigue !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played this card decreases #yBlock by #yFatigue.

theArcher:TwinShot.NAME: Twin Shot
theArcher:TwinShot.DESCRIPTION: Your next Shot is played twice.
theArcher:TwinShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! Shots are played twice.

theArcher:WingingShot.NAME: Winging Shot
theArcher:WingingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Target loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.
